title: Mark Wilkinson and the Man of Death
description: Mark Wilkinson a normal boy from a big farm family in Nebraska from a small town. Or that is what he thought until he started high school. He found himself being put into an elite set of student of superior grades and accomplishment,but he didn't have anything that set him apart. It didn't make any sense until he discovered that his once ordinary catholic school housed the secret Elves. He was one of them, part of a dying race. He would go through a complicated change discover his true friends and find out that the world was a lot more dangerous than he ever could have imagined with magic and dark forces yet to be seen. Mark found himself making friends and found he had vicious enemies. Mark thought he could still like a normal teenager. He thought wrong... *WARNING THIS BOOK CONTAINS SOME GRAPHIC CONTENT THAT MAY NOT BE SUITABLE FOR PEOPLE UNDER THE AGE OF 16*
author: E.A.G.
